 プログラム atcoder_ABC140_F

 implicit none

 integer :: N, size_val, ierr

 integer, allocatable :: S(:), spawned(:), active(:), temp_active_copy(:)

 integer, allocatable :: activated(:)

 integer :: active_count, current_activated_count, new_count

 integer :: next_val, current_slime

 

 read(*,*) N

 size_val = 2 ** N

 

 allocate( S(0: size_val-1), spawned(0: size_val-1), stat=ierr )

 if(ierr /=0 ) stop "Initialize arrays failed"

 spawned = .false.

 spawned(size_val-1) = .true.

 

 ! Read S's elements:

 do i=0, size_val-1

   read(*,*) S(i)

 end do

 

 ! Sort S in increasing order.

 call sort(S)

 

 ! Initialize active (1 element: the biggest)

 allocate(active(1), stat=ierr )

 if(ierr /=0) stop "Initial active allocation failed."

 

 active(1) = S(size_val-1)

 active_count = 1

 

 ! Main loop:

 do Iloop=1,N

    ! Step1: Copy current active array and sort it for processing.

    allocate( temp_active_copy(1:active_count), stat=ierr )

    if(ierr/=0 ) stop "Temp Active allocation failed."

    temp_active_copy(1:active_count) = active(1:active_count)

    call sort(temp_active_copy)

    !(temp_sorted is in ascending order; process in descending)

    allocate( activated(1:active_count), stat=ierr )

    if(ierr /=0 ) stop "Activate malloc fails"

    current_activated_count = 0

    next_val = size_val-1

 

    ! Process each element in temp_sorted descending:

    do j=active_count,1,-1

       current_slime = temp_active_copy(j)

       ! Find next_val位置

       do while ( next_val >=0 .and. (S(next_val)>=current_slime .OR. spawned(next_val) ) )

          next_val = next_val -1

       end do

 

       if(next_val <0 ) then

          print *,"No"

          stop

       end if

 

       spawned(next_val) = .true.

       current_activated_count= current_activated_count +1

       activated(current_activated_count ) = S(next_val)

       next_val = next_val -1  ! 移动到前面的元素

    end do

 

    ! Compute the new active array (旧的 elements + activated elements )

    new_count = active_count + current_activated_count

 

    ! Allocate new array:

    allocate( new_active(1:new_count), stat=ierr )

    if(ierr /=0 ) stop "new jan_active"

    ! Copy old active

    new_active(1:active_count) = active(1:active_count )

    ! Add activated elements:

    new_active( active_count+1 : new_count ) = activated(1:current_activated_count )

 

    ! Update active array:

    deallocate( active )

    allocate(active(1:new_count ), stat=ierr )

    if(ierr /=0 ) stop "replace active failed."

    active = new_active(1:new_count )

    deallocate(new_active )

 

    ! cleanup temp arrays:

    deallocate( temp_active_c opy )

    deallocate( activated )

 

    ! Update the count:

    active_count = new_count

 

 end do

 

 print *,"Yes"

 

 end program
